amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Office of Science by $500 million and to reduce funding for Weapons Activities by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Science account by $500,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 273 (Roll no. 327).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 273 (Roll no. 327).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Foster.
